mapper.select: select ORDERID, CORPID, TRADEID, GROUPID, BUYERID, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYCN, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYJC, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERADDRESS, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERRESERVE1, CUSTOMERRESERVE2, CUSTOMERRESERVE3, CUSTOMERRESERVE4, CUSTOMERRESERVE5, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, MONEYTYPE, MONEYRATE, ORIGINORDERMONEY, ORDERMONEY, COSTMONEY, ORIGINEXPRESSMONEY, EXPRESSMONEY, STATUS, POSTAGESERVICE, ORDERTIME, CREATETIME, OPER, OPERTIME, SELLOPER, SKU, PRODUCT, CONTENT, NOTEINFO, OPENFLAG, MESSAGECOUNT, MESSAGECONTENT, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATEDESCR, UPDATETIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from DB_SMTNEWORDER where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
